expression.expression-string:
medium = LocalPotential1D() medium.set_spatial_parameters(points_per_cell=200)
a = medium.check_real_space_eigenstate(0,0) b = medium.check_real_space_eigenstate(0,1) c = medium.check_real_space_eigenstate(0.2,0) medium.plot_check_real_space_eigenstate()

medium = LocalPotential1D() medium.set_spatial_parameters(points_per_cell=1200) medium.set_medium_parameters(bands=10, k_points=100, valence_bands=1, spin_factor=2) medium.set_wave_function_parameters(positive_wavenumbers=80)
aaa = medium.check_real_space_eigenstate(0,0.3) medium.plot_wave_function(0,0.3)

medium = LocalPotential1D() medium.set_spatial_parameters(points_per_cell=1200) medium.set_medium_parameters(bands=10, k_points=100, valence_bands=1, spin_factor=2) medium.set_wave_function_parameters(positive_wavenumbers=80)
aaa = medium.check_real_space_eigenstate(0.3,0) medium.plot_wave_function(0.3,0)
